content.rendered:
Directed by Lokesh Kanagaraj

Written by Lokesh Kanagaraj. Pon Parthiban. Sanjeev Tiwari

Cast Karthi (Dilli). Narain (Bejoy). Arjun Das (Anbu). George Maryan (Napoleon). Harish Uthaman (Adaikalam). Hareesh Peradi (Stephen Raj). Ramana (Tips). Dheena (Kamatchi). Suryakanth (Kamatchi’s Paternal Uncle). Kanna Ravi (Ajhas Ahmed / Sampath). Amzath Khan (Ram). Arun Alexander (Paalpandi / Thug Leader). Lallu (College Student). Vatsan Chakravarthy (College Student). Udayaraj (College Student). Kishore Rajkumar (Ashok, College Student). Deepthi (Thamizh, College Student). Monica (Amudha). Krishnamoorthy (K. Venkat). R.N.R. Manohar (Senior Police Officer). Malavika Avinash (Nalini). Chethan (Dr. Amudhan). Ravi Kumar Ram (Comedian).’Winner’ Ramachandran. Mozammel Hoshen Chowdhury. Asif Syed

Languages Tamil. Hindi

Producers Aravendraj Bhaskaran. S.R. Prabhu. S.R. Prakashbabu. Thangaprabaharan. Tiruppur Vivek

Production Dream Warrior Picture. Vivekananda Picture
